msgSnippet: I am sure I am having a pre-mature senior moment here, but perhaps someone can help me.  I am having trouble installing JUnit as a Visual Age for Java tool.

From: "Leon Webster" <leon@...>

I am sure I am having a pre-mature "senior moment" here, but perhaps someone
can help me.  I am having trouble installing JUnit as a Visual Age for Java
tool.

The instructions for running Junit from within Visual Age say
 "1. copy the directory vaj\tools\test-ui into the VAJ_INSTALLDIR\ide\tools
directory"

I can't locate the directory "vaj\tools\test-ui" in JUnit3.5.zip.  I am
pretty sure it was there in JUnit 3.2 (but not absolutely sure).  I can't
find a place on JUnit.org to download the file.

Can some one point me in the right direction?

Thanks much.

Leon Webster
subject: junit 3.5 and visua age 3.5
